Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Founded in 2015, Derong Medical Technology Co., Ltd. is a high-tech enterprise focusing on medical device technology research and development, healthcare investment management and healthcare informatization services.The company is headquartered in China and has branches and R&D centers in many countries and regions around the world.

As a pioneer in the field of medical technology, we have always adhered to the development concept of "innovation-driven, technology-led", integrating the world's top medical resources to create intelligent medical solutions.The company has a professional team consisting of medical experts, engineers and management elites, dedicated to promoting the innovation and development of medical technology.

Delong Medical Technology has successfully developed and launched a number of high-end medical devices with independent intellectual property rights, including surgical robotic systems, intracardiac ultrasound imaging systems, and extracorporeal ventricular assist devices, etc. The products are widely used in many medical fields such as cardiovascular, neurosurgery, orthopedics, etc., and provide advanced medical technology and equipment support for medical institutions around the world.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Some of the medical information generated between 2015 and 2020 is mainly video recordings
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We will use the Boost tool and singularity
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America, South America, Europe
